title: Mushrooms with Tomato and Herbs
introduction: Experience the rich flavors of mushrooms cooked to perfection with garlic, tomato, and rosemary. This savory dish makes a delightful pairing with pork chops or steak, bringing an Italian flair to your meal.
ingredients: 1 large tomato, peeled, seeded, and chopped
Salt and freshly ground black pepper

instructions.description: Wipe the mushrooms clean with damp paper towels. Snap off the stems of the mushrooms and trim the ends where soil collects. Cut the mushrooms into halves or quarters. In a large skillet, heat the oil over medium heat. Add the mushrooms, garlic, and rosemary. Cook, stirring frequently, until the mushrooms are browned, about 10 minutes.
Add the tomato and salt and pepper to taste. Cook until the juices evaporate, about 5 minutes more. Stir in the parsley and serve immediately.
